mapper.sql: bidingUID, bidingNo, auctionid, username, price, bidingtime
mapper.insert:
insert into bidingprice
bidingUID,
bidingNo,
auctionid,
username,
price,
bidingtime,

mapper.update:
update bidingprice
bidingNo = #{bidingno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auctionid = #{auctionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bidingtime = #{bidingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where bidingUID = #{bidinguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bidingprice set bidingNo = #{bidingno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auctionid = #{auctionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bidingtime = #{bidingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where bidingUID = #{bidinguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select bidingNo, price, bidingtime from bidingprice where auctionid = #{auctionid} order by price desc
